Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Intro_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="41e11635f9e74d158ea46a01a7197ddb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitLouie02" lipsync="0"/]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41e11635f9e74d158ea46a01a7197ddb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41e11635f9e74d158ea46a01a7197ddb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]I kinda want to stay here...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="51edc4cebfcf497983b3590d76631ace" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitLouie02" lipsync="0"/]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51edc4cebfcf497983b3590d76631ace" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSad"/]I'm hungry...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want something fresh.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51edc4cebfcf497983b3590d76631ace" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Go find a cave...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Get me some grub...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
before the Onion gets it...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="0632da114c93446cafdb9e4fcfb32248" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurprise"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Area500"/]I wonder if I can ride this one too...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="f723a623bb2e4a0498b87d830fc3f418" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Yeah.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Bigger dogs are better.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="2e0d6016617f4ba3a04759050d8031eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Now that I have the ingredients I need...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2e0d6016617f4ba3a04759050d8031eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]You can have...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]this.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="30b227ed894e4cb3a64b933d7fd1b0a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]A Sovereign Bulblax feast for supper...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's going to be a good night.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="568626d4aabd4483acaa564ac1c74d8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You got the grub, huh.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="568626d4aabd4483acaa564ac1c74d8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Then take this.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="582cadb4cd1e4ef2bb6a5b6eb853d4dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitLouie02"/]Go get more ingredients.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="582cadb4cd1e4ef2bb6a5b6eb853d4dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitNoVoice"/]I'm still missing some...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="c25b81c0dbf44994b4082ab46a457694" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Go get [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]4 Dwarf Bulborbs[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] There were
some at that something-something
Hollows.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="46b37d72726e4fdc8a1aa895727d4d60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Check out something-something Hollows
in that terrace place.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="def8138fddbd4239a1d268c1928d5b83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]Dwarf Bulborbs taste great in stews...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="f836c6020b104a33b10d121c44d78d13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Next,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I want [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]2 Yellow Wollyhops[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think I
saw some at that blah-blah...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]Courtyard.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="896b6c467a6d448fa5044e493fc45699" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The blah-blah Courtyard, or whatever.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
It's where all those floating petals are.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="8c8900811f3b4eaca51e8a601734039c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitLouie02"/]Char-grilled Yellow Wollyhop legs...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Yum...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="c4de4f6833c54b39b8533f4b0723ccf6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm in the mood for [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]1 Peckish Aristocrab[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
You can catch 'em at that Resort place.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="822c0706dfe24e19a8cf4fa9dbd46401" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You find them by the water.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] At that
Resort something-or-other...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="c7d1c646aefa4a218a4ee2646787811e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Crab soup or crab sashimi...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Tough call.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="8da21b915f5a4719a989ac420a3ca463" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm so hungry I could eat [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]1 whole Fiery
Bulblax[System:Color name="Default"]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] They might be in that cave
called...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]something-something the Beast.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="1705e05dc28146448d425db281acf3c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Go to that something-something the
Beast.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Near the hearth.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="41ed2a0c61174422ad61c68437d6db5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]Fiery Bulblaxes...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The eyeballs are
the best part.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="9973617abcc24031878cb8df00591d55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Just[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] 1 Giant Breadbug[System:Color name="Default"]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Look for one at a
place called...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]something-something Palace.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="ac1afcab77344ee1b182e75c4a80a2c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It's like...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]"insert word here" Palace.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Somewhere in a building,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess?
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="3d3bd2ac89244c20b6beb77ed8ee55f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Giant Breadbugs are bland...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I need to find
a better recipe for them.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="a366fe232a0d4dfabd0859f38b923016" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I could go for [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]1 Sovereign Bulblax [System:Color name="Default"]tonight...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
You can find one for me wherever that
giant dog is.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="4bb41009e8684fd2b003676768cb0537" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That dog den's swarming with good
catches.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wanna go back...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="e8b4ff4117bd4dee886ed3e4c7358454" Scale="0.9914255"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A Sovereign Bulblax can be a three-course
meal.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Add the ferns on its back for garnish.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="38ca716747a649348fe1280f0fc23624" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I like this planet...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wanna show it to
Nana someday.
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="c6fdb76213cc4d7088832e4c43311b23" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitLouie02"/]President...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What's his name?
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="e9e91fcc88a24d5092c15be024bb4d40" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSad"/]I really wanna stay here...
Louie.Louie_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="772ebfdf17fb42e4a528585a2a458d5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Mmm, space food... [etc:Wait frame="8"/]It's not enough...
